    • Constructor Detail

      • Pheme

        public Pheme(java.lang.String hostname)
        Create a new Pheme client instance. This constructor will connect to the Pheme server at hostname over RMI asynchronously, so this method will not block. Data sent to this client is buffered until server communication is established. If after trying a couple of times, no connection can be made this client will silently die and drop all messages sent to it.
        Parameters:
        hostname - Hostname of the Pheme server.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public Component register(java.lang.String componentName,
                 ComponentType type)
        Register a new component with Pheme. This method constructs a new Component that can be sent the various datatypes Pheme supports.
        Parameters:
        componentName - Name of the component. This name will be displayed in all references to this component. Format it for readability.
        type - ComponentType of the component to register.
        Returns:
        A Component object to send messages with.

      • registerJob

        public Component registerJob(java.lang.String componentName)
        Convenience method for registering new Jobs.
        Parameters:
        componentName - Name of the job. This name will be displayed in all references to this component. Format it for readability.
        Returns:
        A Component object to send messages with.

      • registerComputer

        public Component registerComputer(java.lang.String componentName)
        Convenience method for registering new Computers.
        Parameters:
        componentName - Name of the computer. This name will be displayed in all references to this component. Format it for readability.
        Returns:
        A Component object to send messages with.

      • killClient

        public void killClient()
        Stop the Pheme client from sending data to the server. All messages will be dropped.

      • startServer

        public static Server startServer()
        Starts a Pheme server. This method will attempt to download the Pheme server code, extract it and run it. Returns null if the server fails to start. Using this method will construct a server that automatically shuts down when the calling JVM exits.
        Returns:
        Pheme Server or null

      • startServer

        public static Server startServer(boolean autoShutdown)
        Starts a Pheme server. This method will attempt to download the Pheme server code, extract it and run it. Returns null if the server fails to start. Use autoShudown to specify if the server should shut down on JVM exit.
        Returns:
        Pheme Server or null

      • killServer

        public void killServer()
        Kills the started Pheme server. Noop if server is not up.

      • getServer

        public Server getServer()
        Returns the running Pheme server or null if the server is not running.
        Returns:
        Pheme Server or null

        protected boolean send(DTO dto)

            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
